FILE_UPLOAD.FILE_TYPE_ERROR: The file must be one the following file types: {{acceptedTypes}}

ALERTS.ACCOUNT_DISABLED: Your account appears to be disabled. Please contact the business you're booking with if the problem persists.
ALERTS.ALREADY_REGISTERED: You have already registered with this email address. Please login or reset your password.
ALERTS.APPT_AT_SAME_TIME: Your appointment is already booked for this time
ALERTS.ATTENDEES_CHANGED: Your booking has been successfully updated
ALERTS.EMAIL_IN_USE: There's already an account registered with this email. Use the search field to find the $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.CUSTOMER)'s account.
ALERTS.EMPTY_BASKET_FOR_CHECKOUT: You need to add some items to the basket before you can checkout.
ALERTS.FB_LOGIN_NOT_A_MEMBER: Sorry, we couldn't find a login associated with this Facebook account. You will need to sign up using Facebook first
ALERTS.GENERIC: Sorry, it appears that something went wrong. Please try again or call the business you're booking with if the problem persists.
ALERTS.GEOLOCATION_ERROR_FORBIDDEN: Sorry, we could not determine your $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.LOCATION) as your browser does not allow websites to request your physical $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.LOCATION). Please check your browser settings.
ALERTS.GEOLOCATION_ERROR: Sorry, we could not determine your $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.LOCATION). Please try searching instead.
ALERTS.GIFT_CERTIFICATE_REQUIRED: A valid Gift Certificate is required to proceed with this booking
ALERTS.ITEM_NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE: The selected time is no longer available. Please pick another.
ALERTS.COULD_NOT_ADD_ITEM: Sorry. I could not add this item to a basket.
ALERTS.COULD_NOT_MODIFY_APPOINTMENT: Sorry. I could not modify this appointment.
ALERTS.AVAILABILITY_ERROR: There was an error looking up availability.
ALERTS.GET_SERVICES_ERROR: There was an error getting the $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.SERVICE) list.
ALERTS.GET_EVENT_GROUPS_ERROR: There was an error getting the event groups list.
ALERTS.GET_RESOURCES_ERROR: There was an error getting the $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.RESOURCE-plural) list.
ALERTS.GET_PEOPLE_ERROR: There was an error getting the $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.STAFF_MEMBER-plural) list.
ALERTS.GET_EVENTS_ERROR: There was an error getting the events.
ALERTS.NO_WAITLIST_SPACES_LEFT: Sorry, the space has now been taken, you are still in the waitlist and we will notify you if more spaces become available
ALERTS.LOGIN_FAILED: Sorry, your email or password was not recognised. Please try again or reset your password.
ALERTS.SSO_LOGIN_FAILED: Something went wrong when trying to log you in. Please try again.
ALERTS.MAXIMUM_TICKETS: Sorry, the maximum number of tickets per $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.STAFF_MEMBER) has been reached.
ALERTS.PASSWORD_RESET_FAILED: Sorry, we couldn't update your password. Please try again.
ALERTS.PASSWORD_RESET_REQ_FAILED: Sorry, we didn't find an account registered with that email.
ALERTS.PASSWORD_RESET_REQ_SUCCESS: We have sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
ALERTS.PAYMENT_FAILED: We were unable to take payment. Please contact your card issuer or try again using a different card
ALERTS.PHONE_NUMBER_IN_USE: There's already an account registered with this phone number. Use the search field to find the $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.CUSTOMER)'s account.
ALERTS.REQ_TIME_NOT_AVAIL: The requested time slot is not available. Please choose a different time.
ALERTS.TIME_SLOT_NOT_SELECTED: You need to select a time slot
ALERTS.STORE_NOT_SELECTED: You need to select a store
ALERTS.TOPUP_FAILED: Sorry, your topup failed. Please try again.
ALERTS.TOPUP_SUCCESS: Your wallet has been topped up
ALERTS.NOT_BOOKABLE_PERSON: Sorry, this $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.STAFF_MEMBER) does not offer this $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.SERVICE), please select another
ALERTS.NOT_BOOKABLE_RESOURCE: Sorry, $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.RESOURCE) does not offer this $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.SERVICE), please select another
ALERTS.SPEND_AT_LEAST: You need to spend at least {{min_spend | pretty_price}} to make a booking.
ALERTS.COUPON_APPLY_FAILED: Sorry, your coupon could not be applied. Please try again.
ALERTS.DEAL_APPLY_FAILED: Sorry, your deal code could not be applied. Please try again.
ALERTS.DEAL_REMOVE_FAILED: Sorry, we were unable to remove that deal. Please try again.
ALERTS.TICKETS_REMOVED_FROM_BOOKING: {number, plural, =1{Ticket} other{Tickets}} removed from your booking.
ALERTS.TICKETS_REMOVED_FROM_BOOKING_FOR_ATTENDE: {number, plural, =1{Ticket} other{Tickets}} for {attendees} removed from your booking.
ALERTS.NOT_BOOKABLE_PERSON_OR_RESOURCE: Sorry, this $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.SERVICE) isn't setup to work with that $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.STAFF_MEMBER) or that $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.RESOURCE). Please change your selection.
ALERTS.ERROR_DELETING_OBJECT: There was an error deleting this Item
ALERTS.ERROR_DELETING_SERVICE_OBJECT: There was an error deleting this $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.SERVICE)
ALERTS.ERROR_DELETING_CLIENT_OBJECT: There was an error deleting this $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.CUSTOMER)
ALERTS.ERROR_DELETING_RESOURCE_OBJECT: There was an error deleting this $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.RESOURCE)
ALERTS.ERROR_DELETING_PERSON_OBJECT: There was an error deleting this $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.STAFF_MEMBER)
ALERTS.STAFF_OR_RESOURCE_MARKED_AS_DISABLED: You have selected a disabled $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.STAFF_MEMBER-plural) or $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.RESOURCE). They do not appear in the $t(COMMON.TERMINOLOGY.CUSTOMER) journey, but can still be booked by admins
